Description:
SummaryIn ENOWA Commercial Hub we are ‘Energizing our 100% renewable future’. Origination: Sales contributes to achieving this vision by providing clean and cost-efficient energy to our customers and unlocking flexible demand for efficient energy system balancing. The purpose of the Key Account / Contract Manager role within the Origination: Sales – I&C Customers Service Desk team is to provide service and manage accounts of large industrial and commercial customers.Key Accountabilities and ResponsibilitiesKey Account Contract Management   To be responsible for all activities related to key account and contract management in the build-up phase and following build-up of the 100% renewable energy system, including but not limited to:Managing internal stakeholders across multiple projects to facilitate the supply of energy to future customers (e.g. customer delivery programmes, interfacing with TSO / DSO / Grid Planning etc.)
Managing the onboarding and ongoing accounts of industrial and large commercial customers (e.g., managing customer relations, answering queries, updating information in internal databases, resolving issues, etc.)
Cross-selling ENOWA products (e.g., carbon services, energy management, etc.)
Leading commercial management of I&C supply contracts, including contract performance monitoring, management of contract extensions and amendments, communication with customers, resolving issues, etc.
Operating help desk for I&C customers (e.g., answering queries, responding to load shifting and other requests, providing information about market, products, and services, etc.)Background, SkillsMinimum of 7 years of experience in energy or related industry, ideally in a similar position
Experience in project management and account management of industrial & commercial power system customers
Knowledge of best practices and common requirements of wholesale electricity contracts
Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills
Strong team player
Desire to accept the challenge of developing a fully renewable system
Motivation to work in the Middle EastQualificationsBachelor’s Degree in Business, Economics, Finance, or other related degree, preferably with focus on energy marketsJob Details
